description:
5a, 5c, 5g, 5l: fix build for Linux/ARM.
ARM doesn't have the concept of scale, so I renamed the field
Addr.scale to Addr.flag to better reflect its true meaning.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Thanks, this fixed the build on my arm5 host.

On Mon, Feb 20, 2012 at 10:11 AM,  <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> *** Submitted as
> http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e95b330978b3 ***
>
>
> 5a, 5c, 5g, 5l: fix build for Linux/ARM.
> ARM doesn't have the concept of scale, so I renamed the field
> Addr.scale to Addr.flag to better reflect its true meaning.
>
> R=rsc
> CC=golang-dev
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5687044
>
> Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>
>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5687044/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e95b330978b3 ***

5a, 5c, 5g, 5l: fix build for Linux/ARM.
ARM doesn't have the concept of scale, so I renamed the field
Addr.scale to Addr.flag to better reflect its true meaning.

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5687044

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

subject: code review 5687044: 5a, 5c, 5g, 5l: fix build for Linux/ARM.
